swapDisclaimerTitle.message: Disclaimer. Beta version, read before using the SWAP section.

swapDisclaimerContent.message:
Temple wallet only provides an interface to interact with the Mavryk Dexes. 

We are not responsible for: DEX issues, displayed tokens, price, exchange rates, and user trading decisions. 

Before using this Swap Section, you should review the relevant documentation to understand how the DEX(AMM) protocols work. 

Using this section is solely the user's responsibility.

verifySeedPhraseDescription.message: Fill in the blank fields with the words to verify your Seed Phrase backup

addressBalanceDescription.message: After creating an account, you‚Äôll get a unique address - your personal account identifier in the Mavryk blockchain. If you would like to receive and use MVRK or tokens built on Mavryk, you should use this address.

addressBalanceHint.message: You may also use a custom wallet address name from $link$ like alice.mav instead of the alphanumeric wallet address.

howToStartDescription1.message: To start using your wallet and interacting with the Mavryk DApps ecosystem, the account balance must be positive. To do this, top up your address with MAV.

howToStartDescription2.message:
You can use the "Buy" button to exchange your
cryptocurrencies, as well as top up your balance using fiat currencies to receive MAV or USDt.

howToStartHint.message: Also, you can copy your address and send coins to it from another wallet or Exchange. To copy the address, click on it on the main wallet screen or use ‚ÄúReceive‚Äù.

profileRpcDescription.message: At the top of the interface, you can see your account robo-icon. By clicking on it, you will see the parameters for interaction with accounts, the settings button, and the extension view mode.

profileRpcHint1.message: Next, you will see the ‚ÄúNetworks‚Äù selector, which allows you to select a node (RPC) to which your Temple extension will be connected.

profileRpcHint2.message: If your balance is not displayed, try changing the node.

profileRpcHint3.message: You can choose from a predefined list or add RPC manually by following these

browserVersionIsOutOfDate.message: Your browser version is out of date, we strongly recommend updating to the newest version!

congratsDescription2.message: Now you know about the basic and most important functions of the Temple wallet.

congratsDescription3.message: You can learn all features of the Temple from our ‚ÄúEducational series‚Äù on YouTube.

congratsDescription4.message: Also, instructions and guides are available in our knowledge base.

congratsDescription5.message: Join our communities in Telegram and Discord.

congratsDescription6.message: PS: Good luck exploring the Mavryk world!

attentionDescription.message: Never and under any pretext share your private keys and seed phrase with third parties.

attentionListItem1.message: Your wallet can be targeted through a browser 0days or via other malicious extension installed;

attentionListItem2.message: The screen can potentially be manipulated by malicious software installed in the system;

attentionListItem3.message: User‚Äôs host machine can be targeted by malware to steal encrypted wallet;

attentionListItem4.message: Choosing weak passwords can reduce the ability of a wallet to resist adversarial brute-forcing.

attentionListTitle2.message: To keep your assets safe, we recommend:

attentionListItem5.message: Move your funds from ‚Äúhot‚Äù wallet to ‚Äúcold‚Äù as soon as possible (Temple wallet supports integration with ‚ÄúLedger Nano‚Äù devices);

attentionListItem6.message: Use separate browsers for web-surfing and wallet‚Äôs operating;

attentionListItem7.message: Use one browser‚Äôs tab at a time to make transactions;

attentionListItem8.message: Keep the wallet locked when it is not in usage.

takeCare.message: Take care of your safety in the crypto world!

aboutDescription.message: The Mavryk wallet is your go to platform for seizing control of your financial freedom through real-world assets and DeFi. Mavryk Wallet is fully non-custodial, ensuring exclusive control over your assets. Welcome to a new era of financial empowerment.

In case you have any questions, get in touch
 with the community!

stakeListItem1.message: Earn your first reward in ~21 days, then receive payouts every ~3 days.

stakeListItem2.message: Your MVRK tokens stay in your wallet, under your control. Use them anytime!

delegatePlanListOption1.message: Earn competitive yields that adjust with network activity

delegatePlanListOption2.message: Tokens are 100% liquid and stay in your wallet‚Äîuse them anytime

tokensHint.message: Your Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are displayed on the ‚ÄúNFTs‚Äù tab. Here you can interact with your NFTs, see their full view, ID, and token details.

profileAndAccountsDesc.message: You can have multiple accounts within one wallet! At the top of the screen, you can see your account icon. By clicking on it, you will see your other accounts connected to this wallet.

profileAndAccountsHintPart1.message: On the top right you can see the settings button, network selector, and connected sites icon. The network selector allows you to select a node to which Mavryk wallet will be connected.

unrecognizedRPC.message: Unrecognized RPC node. It may not work properly with the wallet, please verify node url.

joinMavryk.message: Join Mavryk Pro and Unlock New Opportunities!

proSreenItem1.message: Verify once, use throughout the ecosystem. The pro wallet version offers address verifications.

proSreenItem2.message: Seamlessly interact with Real World Assets all within your wallet.

proSreenItem3.message: Easily use RWA's in DeFi; trade, lend, & borrow.

proSreenItem4.message: Non-custodial: take control of your financial future and manage your portfolio.

mavopolySuccessMsg.message: Your wallet address has been verified. You can now hold and interact with RWA tokens in this wallet.

addressVerificationMsg.message: You can access this verification screen anytime through the Mavryk Pro tab on your wallet's Home Screen.

addressVerificationDescr.message: Verify your vault contract addresses here. As part of Testnet, you are required to use vault‚Äôs on Maven Finance to leverage your RWAs. For that to happen, they need to be verified for the purposes of the game. You can do that here.

veridyAddressSuccessMsg.message: The address has been successfully verified.

verifyAddressErrMsg.message: The address is invalid. Please check it again or try a different one.

coStakeDesriptionSuccessMsg.message: Your MVRK has been successfully co-staked and is now actively earning rewards.

reDelegateToNewValidatorDescr.message: By re-delegating to a new validator, your funds are seamlessly transferred while remaining actively staked. You'll continue earning rewards from your current validator until the transfer completes, then immediately begin earning from the new validator with no interruption in rewards or participation.
